title: Sniffing Ham and Taking Names
itunes:title: Sniffing Ham and Taking Names
description:
A Florida man with drugs wrapped around his penis deny they were his, a man is accused of killing his grandmother as she opened Christmas gifts and a woman kills her boyfriend with a sword on Christmas Eve. We give our top 3 book, album and movie recommendations of the year. Goodbye 2021! 

Right now, Dad Grass is offering our listeners 20% off your first order when you go to dadgrass.com/jrvp 

For a limited time, you can get 25% off and zero delivery fees on your first order of $15 or more, when you download the DoorDash app and enter code JRVP.
